alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Fergus (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 7:28PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Fergus and south central Blaine Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 728 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 20 miles northeast of Winifred, or 26 miles southwest of Zortman, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Fergus and south central Blaine Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for central and north central Montana.
